text: The Broons is a comic strip in the Scottish newspaper The Sunday Post. It is about a Scottish family with 11 members. The strip is written in Scots. ==Family Members== *Maw *Paw *Granpaw *Hen *Joe *Daphne *Maggie *Horace *The Twins *The Bairn Category:Comic strips Category:1936 establishments in Europe Category:Fictional families Category:20th-century establishments in Scotland
title: The Broons
